mosinstall.name: Html Module
mosinstall.author: Gabiriele Lalasava
mosinstall.description: This module allows you to add any html/javascript (within the document's body tag) to a module. It can be used to add affiliate code, copy and paste codes, google adsense etc. You can copy the module using mambo's module copy feature, and create many differnt html content.

param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module Class Suffix
param.description: Suffix to append to the CSS class attribute of this module.

param.name: cache
param.label: Enable Cache
param.description: Select whether to cache the content of this module

param.name: fwd_html
param.label: HTML
param.description: Add any Html or Javascript Here. Eg: Google Adsense Code, Copy and Paste Scripts

param.name: clean_js
param.label: Clean JS
param.description: Clean all JavaScript of HTML Line Breaks

param.name: clean_css
param.label: Clean CSS
param.description: Clean all Inlined CSS of HTML Line Breaks

param.name: clean_all
param.label: Clean HTML
param.description: Clean all HTML of Line Breaks. This may help if you are getting odd empty verticle space in your HTML output.
